name: part_002
file: tmp_【#沙花叉クロヱ3D】シャチ出没注意【ホロライブ】 [MOekZ-g5qJQ]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_002.mov

scenes.description: Chloe asks her viewers to 'send' fish, and they start appearing on the stage.
A massive number of realistic yellowtail fish fall from the sky, overwhelming Chloe.
Chloe interacts with the fish, picking one up and comparing its cuteness to hers.
A mysterious video plays, leading to the moment Chloe is forced to take off her mask.
Chloe reveals her full face and interacts with the audience, showing off her 3D model's physics.

subtitles.original: 小なり大なり、小なりお魚、流してください！
subtitles.english: Big or small, please send some fish my way!

subtitles.original: そのご褒美貰っとるも…ちょっとやってあげようかなーっと思ったり、
subtitles.english: I'm receiving rewards for it... so I thought I might do something for you,

subtitles.original: 仮面外してあげようかなーっと思ってるんですけども、
subtitles.english: I was thinking about maybe taking off my mask...

subtitles.original: 流して流して！どうぞ！
subtitles.english: Send them, send them! Go ahead!

subtitles.original: ねえ、違うでしょ？それじゃないでしょ？ねえ、みんなちゃんと見てんだよおさか…
subtitles.english: Hey, that's not right, is it? It's not that, right? Hey, everyone is watching the fi—

subtitles.original: うわあああああ！やだあああああ！
subtitles.english: Whoaaa! Noooo!

subtitles.original: なんか来たんだけど！うわあああああ！
subtitles.english: Something just came! Whoaaa!

subtitles.original: 何これ？！やば！えっ…
subtitles.english: What is this?! This is crazy! Uh...

subtitles.original: お魚？
subtitles.english: A fish?

subtitles.original: お魚来たよね…リアルすぎん？ちょっとリアルすぎん？
subtitles.english: A fish really came... Isn't it too realistic? Isn't it a bit too real?

subtitles.original: えっ、えっ、みんなが、ねえ、みんながコメントするから！
subtitles.english: Eh, eh, because everyone... hey, because everyone is commenting!

subtitles.original: うわあああああ！何これ！ねえ、多いよ！うわあああああ！きもい！
subtitles.english: Whoaaa! What is this! Hey, there are too many! Whoaaa! Gross!

subtitles.original: おい、沙花叉の3Dお披露目でしょーが！何これ！
subtitles.english: Hey, this is Sakamata's 3D debut! What's with this?!

subtitles.original: 持てるのこれ？
subtitles.english: Can I hold this?

subtitles.original: うわ、持てる！うわ持てるよこれ！どっこいしょ！よいしょ！
subtitles.english: Whoa, I can! I can actually hold it! Heave-ho! Up we go!

subtitles.original: みんな、みんなお魚さんだよ。ほらお披露目。
subtitles.english: Everyone, look, it's Mr. Fish. Here's the debut.

subtitles.original: これが見たかったんでしょ？んちゅっちゅ、んむじゅんじゅんじゅん…
subtitles.english: This is what you wanted to see, right? *kissing sounds*

subtitles.original: ねえ何これ、きしょい！気持ち悪いし！
subtitles.english: Hey, what is this, gross! And it's creepy!

subtitles.original: うわああ！活きが良すぎて！うわああ！
subtitles.english: Whoaaa! It's too lively! Whoaaa!

subtitles.original: おらあ！何これきもい！
subtitles.english: Take that! What is this, so gross!

subtitles.original: でもね、みんな。どう？どっちが可愛いの？
subtitles.english: But hey, everyone. What do you think? Which one is cuter?

subtitles.original: どう？沙花叉とこのお魚、どっちが可愛い？ねえねえ。
subtitles.english: How about it? Between Sakamata and this fish, which is cuter? Hey, hey.

subtitles.original: もちろん、もちろん沙花叉だよね？そうだよね？あー良かった良かった。
subtitles.english: Of course, it's Sakamata, right? Right? Oh, thank goodness.

subtitles.original: じゃ、ねえねえねえ、さーちゃんもういいよ、いいよもうコメント！おいおい！大量にいるから！
subtitles.english: Now then, hey, that's enough comments! Hey! There's a massive amount of them!

subtitles.original: ねえ、処理落ちとかしたらどうすんの？怖いでしょーがこれ！
subtitles.english: Hey, what if the stream starts lagging? This is scary!

subtitles.original: やめてって言ってんの！おらおらおらおら！おらおらおらおら！
subtitles.english: I said stop it! Ora ora ora ora!

subtitles.original: よしよし。はぁ、まあでも、これじゃ仮面は外してあげられないなー。
subtitles.english: There, there. *sigh* Well, with things like this, I can't take off my mask.

subtitles.original: みんな残念でしたー。悔しいでしょー？
subtitles.english: Too bad for all of you. Frustrating, isn't it?

subtitles.original: 残念残念。じゃ、このままいっちゃおっかなー。
subtitles.english: Too bad, too bad. Well, I guess I'll just keep going like this.

subtitles.original: この動画を見てください
subtitles.english: Please watch this video

subtitles.original: この動画を見てください…何これ？
subtitles.english: "Please watch this video"... What is this?

subtitles.original: サプライズ？
subtitles.english: A surprise?

subtitles.original: いやー、そうだよねみんな、お祝いしたいよね、沙花叉クロヱの3D配信だもんね。
subtitles.english: Well, of course, everyone wants to celebrate Sakamata Chloe's 3D debut stream.

subtitles.original: えー何だろう何だろう、見てみよ見てみよ。
subtitles.english: I wonder what it is. Let's see, let's see.

subtitles.original: 何？
subtitles.english: What?

subtitles.original: これ見たことあるよ。やだ、見たくない！
subtitles.english: I've seen this before. No, I don't want to look!

subtitles.original: やだやだ、何これ何これ！
subtitles.english: No, no! What is this, what is this!

subtitles.original: うわああ、目離したいのに！うわああ何これ！
subtitles.english: Whoaaa, I want to look away! Whoaaa, what is this!

subtitles.original: 助けて！スタッフさん助けて！うわあああああ！
subtitles.english: Help me! Staff, help! Whoaaa!

subtitles.original: 仮面をはずしてください
subtitles.english: Please take off the mask

subtitles.original: 仮面を外してください？いやいや、沙花叉クロヱが仮面を外すわけないじゃん。
subtitles.english: "Please take off the mask"? No way, there's no way Sakamata Chloe would take off her mask.

subtitles.original: 絶対外してあげないからね！いや、沙花叉はそんな、たかが千の…うっ。
subtitles.english: I'm definitely not taking it off! Sakamata is not someone who— Ugh.

subtitles.original: あ、仮面を脱いでしまった…うわあああ！
subtitles.english: Ah, I took off the mask... Whoaaa!

subtitles.original: はい。というわけで、えー、沙花叉の3Dこんな感じとなってます。どう？可愛いでしょー、なあなあ？
subtitles.english: Okay! So, Sakamata's 3D looks like this. Well? Cute, isn't it? Right?

subtitles.original: どう？あっちこっち。ふふふ。
subtitles.english: How is it? From every angle. Hehe.

subtitles.original: 可愛いでしょー！
subtitles.english: I'm cute, right!

subtitles.original: じゃあ早速ね、この水族館で、遊んでいきたいと思いまーす！
subtitles.english: So now, let's have some fun here in this aquarium!

subtitles.original: ポロンビア！ふふふ。
subtitles.english: Polonbia! Hehe.

subtitles.original: じゃあ、まずは何してほしい沙花叉に？ねえみんな、何してほしいの？
subtitles.english: First of all, what do you want Sakamata to do? Hey everyone, what do you want?

subtitles.original: ちょっとみんなのコメント見て、拾ってっちゃおっかなー。何してほしい、何してほしい？何だい何だい？
subtitles.english: I'll take a look at the comments and pick some out. What do you want me to do? What's it gonna be?

subtitles.original: みんな可愛いしか言ってないじゃん！ねえ何してほしいか言ってよ、言って！言って！
subtitles.english: Everyone is just saying "cute"! Tell me what you want me to do! Tell me! Say it!

subtitles.original: ジャンプ？えっ、ジャンプ、いいよ！ほい！
subtitles.english: Jump? Oh, jump? Sure! There!

subtitles.original: ジャンプ、ジャンプ、ジャンプ、ジャンプ！どう？
subtitles.english: Jump, jump, jump, jump! How's that?

subtitles.original: 沙花叉が一番エッチだと思う飛び方しようか。これぐらい。
subtitles.english: Should I do the jump that I think is the sexiest? About like this.

subtitles.original: これ、これ、これぐらいが一番エッチだと思いませんか？
subtitles.english: Don't you think this... this... about this is the sexiest?

subtitles.original: ジャンプよりこっちの方がよくない？ふふふ。
subtitles.english: Isn't this better than jumping? Hehe.

subtitles.original: 怒られるまた。嫌だよー、大人たちの冷たい目が来る。
subtitles.english: I'm gonna get scolded again. I hate it, the cold stares from the adults.

subtitles.original: はい！まあとりあえずはこの、3Dの素晴らしいボディを手に入れたからにはね、沙花叉のフィジカルのお手並み拝見ってやつをね、
subtitles.english: Okay! Well, now that I've gotten this wonderful 3D body, let's see what I can do physically!
